EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Action Day 2016 - It's nearly here!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}!
Have you heard? Saturday 5th March is NCS Action Day 2016!
It will be a day to reunite with your NCS friends, help out with social action projects near you, discover amazing opportunities and celebrate all your achievements!
Here's how it's going to go down... Daytime - make a difference!
Between 11:00 - 16:00, there will be a variety of social action projects taking place around London, led by your local Youth Boards, that you can get involved in.
Taking part in a project will earn you a FREE ticket to the social action celebration and reunion event later in the day!
To find a project near you, click HERE and sign up.
Evening - celebrate!
From 16:00 - 20:30, we're taking over Conway Hall in Holborn, central London, for our Celebration! Here, you'll be able to take part in interactive workshops and stalls with amazing organisations such as ICS, Sport Relief, Bite the Ballot and loads more.
Then there'll be live music, a DJ and prizes, so you can relax and enjoy all the great things you've achieved as an NCS graduate!
If you are not able to take part in a project during the day to get a free ticket to the evening event, you can purchase a ticket for Â£3.00 HERE, with all proceeds going to charity.
If you attended an event run by The Challenge Society during February half-term, you have already earned your free ticket and can pick it up at the venue on the day. It's going to be a fantastic day, so sign up now to make sure you don't miss out!
See you soon!
The Challenge Society
